        public GAHaiCostFitness(Normalize normalize,
                        Constraint con,
                        double[] costMatrix)
        Parameters:
        normalize - a user defined normalization method
        con - a user defined constraint, in this case user define a max cost constraint
        costMatrix - cost matrix, read from file, generate from normal distribution [20,100]
